segments.advisor_message: So, let’s talk about your income sources. Can you tell me what forms of income you have? We should get a good idea of what’s coming in every month.
segments.client_message: Yeah, I've got my salary, right? It's uh, pretty steady. I make like, about 5,000 bucks a month, before taxes, you know?

segments.advisor_message: Got it! So that’s a gross salary of 5,000 monthly. Do you have any other income sources apart from your salary? Maybe, investments or rental income?
segments.client_message: Oh, right! I also rent out a small place I own, brings in around 1,500 a month. That one's after taxes, so it's net. It’s been great to have that extra cash flow!
